meanings.definition: A particular way in which something is done, created, or performed.
meanings.sent1: She has her own unique styles of painting.
meanings.sent2: The artist's styles are easily recognizable in each of her works.
meanings.sent3: His unconventional styles of cooking always surprise his guests.
meanings.sent4: The dancer's graceful styles on stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The writer's vivid styles of storytelling transport readers to different worlds.

meanings.definition: A distinctive appearance, design, or manner.
meanings.sent1: The vintage car had classic styles that stood out.
meanings.sent2: Her fashion styles always turn heads wherever she goes.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful styles of chasing its tail entertained the children.
meanings.sent4: The old building's architectural styles reflected the era it was built in.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with colorful styles of flowers in full bloom.

meanings.sent1: He has different styles of approaching difficult tasks.
meanings.sent2: The coach taught the team new styles of playing defense.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's humorous styles of telling jokes always make people laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership styles inspire confidence and teamwork among her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's engaging styles of teaching kept the students interested in the lesson.
